content: {"name": "Veterans Affairs \u2013 Community Resource and Referral Center (CRRC)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Military Veterans Only. \n\nClosed on Federal Holidays.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "209 West Fayette Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Bromo Arts District", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21201", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.29018019999999, "longitude": -76.6184814}, "phones": [{"number": "(410) 637-3246", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit every  2 weeks"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring proof of Veteran status"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
